Posts.Content: Mar 22, 2013 04:15PM gogirls wrote: Hi belha, how nervewracking for you, but it sounds like the doctors think it is not cancer, so "don't go there until you are there", you know?  When I found my lump, I somehow knew immediately that it wasn't good, and I knew before the biopsy results came back what they would find - the doctors were cautious in what they said, but you could tell that they were pretty sure it was cancer, (no smooth sides on mine, very clearly invasive.) Thinking of you - try to enjoy your weekend and I hope you'll post how things go on Monday (or Tuesday).
Posts.Title: Freaking out a little bit.. belha Skagitphoenix
